#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{ 
	double s;
	long long n,t,k,i,c,x;
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t--){ 
	 	scanf("%lld", &n);
	 	scanf("%lld", &k);
	 	if(k*(k+1)-2*n<0)
		  printf("-1\n");
		else if(k*(k+1)-2*n==0)
		   printf("0\n");
		else{
		  c=(k*(k+1)-2*n)*4+1;
  		  s=pow(c,0.5);
		  s=(s-1)/2;
	  x= floor(s);
  printf("%d\n",x);
}
	}
}
